title: Affiliate Link Guide
subtitle: Learn how to use your affiliate link to grow your business

whatIs.title: What is an Affiliate Link?
whatIs.content: An affiliate link (also called a referral link) is a special URL that contains your unique referral code. When someone registers for AnyRent using your affiliate link, they become your referral, and you may receive benefits or rewards.

howToGet.title: How to Get Your Affiliate Link
howToGet.content: Your affiliate link is automatically generated based on your merchant's tenant key. You can find it in your Settings page under the Business or Outlet section.
steps: Navigate to Business or Outlet tab
Find the "Referral Link" or "Affiliate Link" section

howToUse.title: How to Use Your Affiliate Link
howToUse.content: Share your affiliate link with others through various channels:
methods: Share via social media (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.)
Send via email or messaging apps (WhatsApp, Telegram, etc.)
Include in your business website or blog
Share with friends, family, or business partners
Add to your business card or promotional materials

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.content: When someone clicks on your affiliate link:
steps: They are directed to the AnyRent registration page
Your referral code is automatically included in the registration form
When they complete registration, the system tracks that they came from your link
You may receive benefits or rewards based on your referral program

benefits.title: Benefits of Using Affiliate Links
items: Track your referrals and marketing efforts
Build your network of AnyRent users
Potentially earn rewards or benefits (check your subscription plan)
Share AnyRent with others who might benefit from it

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.content: To maximize the effectiveness of your affiliate link:
tips: Share your link naturally in conversations about business management
Explain the benefits of AnyRent when sharing your link
Only share with people who might actually benefit from using AnyRent
Keep your affiliate link handy for easy sharing
Follow AnyRent's terms of service and community guidelines

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
notes: Your affiliate link is unique to your merchant account
Do not modify or tamper with the referral code in your link
Affiliate benefits and rewards may vary based on your subscription plan
AnyRent reserves the right to verify referrals and may disqualify fraudulent referrals
Respect privacy and only share your link with people who are interested

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.content: If you're having issues with your affiliate link:
solutions: Make sure you're copying the complete link, including the referral code
Verify that your merchant account is active and in good standing
Check that the link is formatted correctly
Contact support if the issue persists

banner.description: Discover how to use your affiliate link to grow your business
